brewery.brewery_description:
The art and science of brewing come together. Creating beers in Stapylton, QLD.

- Best New Brewery – Royal QLD Beer Awards
- Multiple medal winner!
- Highest-rated brewery on the Gold Coast – Untappd
- Precision brewing with cutting-edge systems = consistent, top-quality beer

beer.beer_name: Triple Fruit Sour - Mango, Pineapple & Citrus

beer.beer_description: Carbon Haze is a soft, juicy pale ale brewed for easygoing moments and flavourful sessions. A smooth combination of Cashmere, Strata, and Mosaic hops brings out mellow notes of tropical fruit, mango and citrus. In the fermenter, we add Mosaic Spectrum - a liquid hop extract that allows us to enhance aroma and flavour without overloading the beer. It’s part of our ongoing effort to explore new techniques and ingredients that improve balance, drinkability, and consistency. The result? A gentle haze, a bright aroma, and a beer that’s easy to come back to.

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 305 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 62! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.checkin_comment: So good I sampled it twice.

user.bio: Cycling, travelling, working, taking photos, listening to music, drinking beer.

beer.beer_description: A bold fusion of flavour and colour, Cardinal Red IPA combines vibrant hop character with a complex malt backbone. This Red IPA delivers a lively blend of citrus, pine, and tropical fruit aromas. Balanced by caramel notes, three distinct red malts, and a subtle roast, each sip strikes the perfect harmony between hoppy intensity and smooth malt complexity. With its deep red hue and aromatic punch, Cardinal Red IPA stands out in both appearance and taste–commanding attention from the first pour to the last drop.

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 75 check-ins with a photo.

beer.beer_description: Bursting with juicy citrus and lush tropical aromas, Nova Dust is a Hazy IPA that delivers big flavour without the heaviness. Soft on the palate with a gentle haze, it balances bright hop character and smooth drinkability and Krush-able flavour. A little punchy, a little cosmic, and always refreshing, this one’s brewed for star-gazing sessions and good times.

beer.beer_description: Designed with the everyday drinker in mind, Carbon Dry is a refreshingly easy-drinking lager that's perfect for any occasion. Whether you're firing up the BBQ, gathering with friends, or enjoying a day on the water, Carbon Dry delivers a crisp flavour that pairs effortlessly with great company and outdoor vibes.

beer.beer_description:
For Those That Enjoy the… OCCASIONAL BEER.
Our West Coast Pilsner is here for every kind of summer moment, the ones best enjoyed with mates, sunshine and a cold one in hand. 
Six limited-edition cans to spot, share and collect. Keep your eyes peeled...you never know where the next Occasional Beer might turn up.

user.bio: When I was 27, I realized there are many attractive craft beers in the world.  Then life is all craft beer and skittles.

beer.beer_description:
Our Oat Cream IPA is a lush, fruit-forward ride bursting with ripe mango and peach, wrapped in a smooth, oat-laden body. Late hop additions and a hint of Skyfarm’s tropical extracts boost the intensity while keeping it balanced. 

It pours hazy and golden, finishing soft and velvety - not a beer that shouts, but one that lingers. Crafted for those who crave more from their IPA: more fruit, more body, more depth.

The very first beer from Carbon 6 Brewing - Exploration Pale Ale.

Embark on a voyage of discovery and exploration with this refreshing pale ale, which blends innovation and tradition to deliver a crisp, adventurous flavour.

It’s part of our ongoing effort to explore new techniques and ingredients that improve balance, drinkability, and consistency. The result? beer.beer_description: Beneath a haze of tropical intensity, a quiet storm brews. This “white” stout flips expectations with Manilita hops and Blue Dream terpenes, a biscuity malt base, and creamy vanilla. Full and fruity with a milkshake-like mouthfeel, roasted notes linger beneath, delivering a smooth, electrifying balance of contrast and flavour.

items.badge_description: What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what! Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 45 different beers that have been brewed as a collaboration. Try 5 more for Level 10!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 15 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 4!

This “white” stout flips expectations with Manilita hops and Blue Dream terpenes, a biscuity malt base, and creamy vanilla. Full and fruity with a milkshake-like mouthfeel, roasted notes linger beneath, delivering a smooth, electrifying balance of contrast and flavour.

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

beer.beer_description: A bold fusion of flavour and colour, Cardinal Red IPA combines vibrant hop character with a complex malt backbone. This Red IPA delivers a lively blend of citrus, pine, and tropical fruit aromas. Balanced by caramel notes, three distinct red malts, and a subtle roast, each sip strikes the perfect harmony between hoppy intensity and smooth malt complexity. With its deep red hue and aromatic punch, Cardinal Red IPA stands out in both appearance and taste–commanding attention from the first pour to the last drop.

Our Oat Cream IPA is a lush, fruit-forward ride bursting with ripe mango and peach, wrapped in a smooth, oat-laden body. Late hop additions and a hint of Skyfarm’s tropical extracts boost the intensity while keeping it balanced. 

It pours hazy and golden, finishing soft and velvety - not a beer that shouts, but one that lingers. Crafted for those who crave more from their IPA: more fruit, more body, more depth.

Ignite your senses with Hyper Glow, a luminous explosion of tropical flavour from Carbon 6 Brewing. This bold double dry hopped IPA is charged with Luminosa, Galaxy, and Lupomax Citra hops, delivering radiant waves of passionfruit, peach, and citrus. A double dry hop infusion with Hyper Boost Citra and Luminosa amps up the juicy aroma, creating a kaleidoscope of vibrant fruit character. Balanced by a smooth malt backbone and clean finish, Hyper Glow is an electrifying brew for hop lovers seeking the ultimate flavour rush.

Embark on a journey through the golden hours with Twilight Trails Hoppy Amber Ale. This captivating brew combines the enchanting allure of El Dorado LUPMAX and Eclipse hops, offering a blend of tropical fruit, citrus, and pine notes. With a rich amber hue and a balanced malt backbone, Twilight Trails provides a smooth, refreshing experience with each sip.

The very first beer from Carbon 6 Brewing - Exploration Pale Ale.

Embark on a voyage of discovery and exploration with this refreshing pale ale, which blends innovation and tradition to deliver a crisp, adventurous flavour.

Carbon Haze is a soft, juicy pale ale brewed for easygoing moments and flavourful sessions. A smooth combination of Cashmere, Strata, and Mosaic hops brings out mellow notes of tropical fruit, mango and citrus. In the fermenter, we add Mosaic Spectrum - a liquid hop extract that allows us to enhance aroma and flavour without overloading the beer. It’s part of our ongoing effort to explore new techniques and ingredients that improve balance, drinkability, and consistency. The result? A gentle haze, a bright aroma, and a beer that’s easy to come back to.

Elani...named after a unique hop, straight out of Yakima Valley, and believed to be the first shipment to QLD. So, we were stoked to get our hands on something not yet seen here in QLD. Elani has brought this refreshing pale to life with soft tropical fruit, peach, melon, and stone fruit characters, making it a perfect companion for the Aussie summer. Elani is crafted for those who enjoy a flavourful yet approachable beer.

beer.beer_name: Triple Fruit Sour - Mango, Pineapple & Citrus
beer.beer_description: Get ready for a tropical explosion! With this vibrant Triple Fruited Sour that ignites your palate with bold mango sweetness, zesty bursts of pineapple, and a bright citrus tang. Bursting with juicy flavour and balanced by a subtle tartness, this brew is like sunshine in a glass - refreshingly bold and unapologetically fruity. Perfect for those long summer afternoons, it’s the ultimate blend of art, science, and tropical delight.

Crank it to full volume. This juicy hazy IPA is turned all the way up with Amplifier - Riwaka Hop Oil, unleashing a concentrated citrus blast that surges through every sip. We’ve layered in Eclipse T90 and Lupomax Citra hops for a full-spectrum flavour hit - zesty mandarin, ripe stone fruit, and that unmistakable tropical haze. At Carbon 6, we back our brewing with science. That means pushing the boundaries, experimenting with advanced hop products like Amplifier to deliver bigger aroma, cleaner intensity, and a smoother finish. This is flavour precision, dialled to eleven.

This strong porter provides us with valuable insights into the operation of our brewhouse. What better way to celebrate the colder months than with a dark beer? This beer features a blend of chocolate, roasted, and caramel malts, delivering a complex flavour profile of rich chocolate, bold coffee, and smooth caramel.

Designed with the everyday drinker in mind, Carbon Dry is a refreshingly easy-drinking lager that's perfect for any occasion. Whether you're firing up the BBQ, gathering with friends, or enjoying a day on the water, Carbon Dry delivers a crisp flavour that pairs effortlessly with great company and outdoor vibes.

Packed with bright raspberry and smooth vanilla on the nose, pHantasy is a laid-back, flavour-filled beer. A hint of coconut sneaks in for a mellow, tropical twist. Easy-drinking, a little fruity, and just the right amount of sweet, this one's made for kicking back.

Discover the timeless charm of our vintage collection Hefeweizen, a classic German-style wheat beer crafted with meticulous attention to the art and science of brewing. Bursting with notes of banana and clove, this refreshing brew offers a smooth, velvety mouthfeel and a hint of citrus zest.

Made with Weyermann malts, our Hefeweizen is an ode to tradition. Perfect for warm days or cool nights, it’s a sip of nostalgia with a modern edge.

Step into the haze with Nebula, a juicy, Hazy IPA that pushes hop innovation to new frontiers. Crafted with a cutting-edge blend of Mosaic Spectrum and Sub Zero Hop Kief this beer bursts with vibrant tropical fruit, passionfruit and citrus notes. Nebula offers an intense hop aroma with a silky-smooth mouthfeel. Its bright, juicy flavour profile will transport you into a world of hop saturation, where every sip is an exploration of bold, aromatic complexity.

Our first Collabs series with our mates at Happy Valley Brewing. This West Coast IPA is wired for maximum impact, CTZ dankness meets modern hop punch, supercharged with Dynaboost for a mind-bending aroma. Crisp, clean, bitter...dangerously moreish. This isn't just a beer, it's a hit of the good stuff.
The perfect mid-lager for when you're having a few!

Bursting with juicy citrus and lush tropical aromas, Nova Dust is a Hazy IPA that delivers big flavour without the heaviness. Soft on the palate with a gentle haze, it balances bright hop character and smooth drinkability and Krush-able flavour. A little punchy, a little cosmic, and always refreshing, this one’s brewed for star-gazing sessions and good times.

Introducing "Last Crusade," a bold Triple Dry Hopped IPA that proudly pays homage to the classic American IPA. This brew is a tribute to the pioneers of the IPA style, combining a relentless hop character with a crystal-clear appearance. Each sip is a journey through time, celebrating the traditional flavours that started it all, while embracing the complexity and intensity of a triple dry-hopped beer.

Beneath a haze of tropical intensity, a quiet storm brews. This “white” stout flips expectations with Manilita hops and Blue Dream terpenes, a biscuity malt base, and creamy vanilla. Full and fruity with a milkshake-like mouthfeel, roasted notes linger beneath, delivering a smooth, electrifying balance of contrast and flavour.

For Those That Enjoy the… OCCASIONAL BEER.
Our West Coast Pilsner is here for every kind of summer moment, the ones best enjoyed with mates, sunshine and a cold one in hand. 
Six limited-edition cans to spot, share and collect. Keep your eyes peeled...you never know where the next Occasional Beer might turn up.
